// This file was automatically generated by Ocumen CLI. It only serves as an example how
// pipelines can be built. The default values here are likely not what you want and we recommend
// changing them according to your needs.
//
// To read more about the available options visit:
//
//      https://vr.tobii.com/sdk/develop/general/pipelines/
//
// Alternatively run
//
//      ocumen_cli pipeline document
//
// which will list all pipeline options available for your current version. As a rule of thumb,
// the following sections are used:
//
// information            - general meta data
// eyetracking_processors - how eye tracking data should be pre-processed
// frame_processors       - how frames (e.g., VR pose data) should be pre-processed
// fusion                 - how eye tracking and fusion data should be combined
// fused_processors       - how fused data should be filtered before algorithms are run
// algorithms             - a set of "some_name" -> "algorithm" mappings that produce actual results
//
// Once you are done editing this file we commend to run
//
//      ocumen_cli pipeline check
//
// to ensure the pipeline file is valid and can be used.
{
    "information": {
        "version": "0.2.2705"
    },

        "element_capacity": 1024,
        "temp_memory": 8306688
    },
    "fusion": {
        "TakeEyeTrackingClosestFrame": {}
    },
    "algorithms": {
        "myVelocity": {
            "Velocity": {
                "VelocitiesGazeInstantaneous": {}
            }
        },
        "myFixation": {
            "Fixation": {
                "FixationTobiiIVT": {
                    "detect_fixation_if_angle_speed_below_angle_per_sec": "30 deg",
                    "discard_fixations_below": "100 ms",
                    "merge_adjacent_when_gap_below": "100 ms",
